mapper.select: SELECT t.site_id_ AS site_id_, SUM(t.pv_count_) AS pv_count_, SUM(t.uv_count_) AS uv_count_, SUM(t.ip_count_) AS ip_count_, SUM(t.nv_count_) AS nv_count_, SUM(t.bounce_count_) AS bounce_count_, SUM(t.duration_) AS duration_ FROM ujcms_visit_trend t WHERE t.period_ = #{period} AND t.date_string_ >= #{begin} AND t.date_string_ <= #{end} GROUP BY t.site_id_
mapper.insert:
insert into ujcms_visit_trend (id_, site_id_, pv_count_, uv_count_, ip_count_, nv_count_, bounce_count_, duration_, date_string_, period_) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.pvCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.uvCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.ipCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.nvCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.bounceCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.dateString,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.period,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
mapper.update: update ujcms_visit_trend set site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pv_count_ = #{pvCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, uv_count_ = #{uvCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ip_count_ = #{ipCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, nv_count_ = #{nvCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bounce_count_ = #{bounceCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, duration_ = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date_string_ = #{dateString,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, period_ = #{period,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_visit_trend (id_, site_id_, pv_count_, uv_count_, ip_count_, nv_count_, bounce_count_, duration_, date_string_, period_) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pvCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uvCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ipCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nvCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bounceCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dateString,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{period,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
mapper.sql: t.id_, t.site_id_, t.pv_count_, t.uv_count_, t.ip_count_, t.nv_count_, t.bounce_count_, t.duration_, t.date_string_, t.period_
